General.Name: Jiangxi Selon Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Selon Industrial Co., Ltd. research, develops, produces, markets, and sells fine chemical products in China and internationally. It offers AC foaming agents, thionyl chloride, chlor-alkali, and other chemical products, as well as industrial sodium hydroxide, liquid chlorine, synthetic hydrochloric acid, and aqueous ammonia. The company also engages in heat and power co generation, and logistics transportation. Jiangxi Selon Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Leping, China.
